level.text: The Director shall charge fees for business license categories with an Entertainment endorsement as follows:
Carnivals and street festivals: $158 per day;
Circus: $14 per car; $19 per truck; with a maximum fee of $875;
Mechanical Amusements Machines: $50 for every three (3) machines;
If the application for the license is submitted thirty (30) days or more before the event: $205 per day of event;
If the application for the license is submitted between fifteen (15) and twenty-nine (29) days before the event: $205 per day of event, plus $100 expediting fee;
If the application for the license is submitted fourteen (14) or fewer days before the event: $205 per day of event, plus $200 expediting fee;

Source: Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 4654 (May 28, 2010)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Emergency Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 8792 (September 24, 2010)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 12191, 12192 (December 24, 2010).
